price: ¿Qué es mejor, esta morada [del Paraíso] o el árbol de Zaqqum?,
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
